name: FLIGHT OPTIONS (AUSTRALIA) PTY LTD
about: Flight Options (Australia) Pty Ltd is a premier aviation training and charter service based at the Sunshine Coast Airport. We specialize in providing comprehensive pilot training programs, ranging from Private Pilot Licences (PPL) to Commercial Pilot Licences (CPL), as well as advanced certifications such as Night Rating, Instrument Rating, and Multi Engine Rating. Our facility offers world-class training and simulation services, meeting the stringent requirements of both Australian and international aviation standards. In addition to our flight training programs, we also operate a private jet charter service, catering to diverse client needs. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Flight Options is dedicated to producing highly skilled and competent pilots. Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors ensure that all students receive the highest quality training available.
